description.value:
This mechanism explodes, dealing area damage at the cost of the mech.

Type ranged; Range 30; Special —

Damage extreme; Damage Type P

Slots 1 (auxiliary)

Self-destruct (3+ PP) As a standard action, the mech can spend all of its PP (minimum 3) to activate its self-destruct mechanism and explode. The explosion deals piercing damage to itself and all targets within a 60-foot radius. This damage is halved with a successful Reflex save. The mech activating this mechanism automatically fails its own Reflex save.

Cost 2-1/2 × tier
